price: And never say about anything, “I will surely do this tomorrow[15],”
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا
footnotes: [15] For you do not know whether you will be able to do it or you will be diverted from it.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
